name: Dice Mystery
description:
Dice Mystery

A mysterious parkour game where your fate is decided by chance. If you're lucky, winning is straightforward; if you're unfortunate, the chances are against you.

You can use a keyboard or controller to move and navigate.

Discord: https://discord.gg/YYAgNP2BrM

I make all art assets and code within 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK game Jam

Background Music by jhaeka
